lyrics.stanza: Lord, nothing but Thy smiling presence will satisfy me. I do not want anything but the smile of Thy glorious face. As long as I have this, I care not whether the heaven comes down or the earth falls apart. The whole world may rise up against me, but as long as I have Thy smile upon me, I can praise Thee, I can praise Thee, and everything is well.
